title: 重要通知：K書中心6/19下午第四次開放大家拿取物品。6/19, K Book Center's A  buildings will be temporarily open for the 4th time on the afternoon of Jun 19 for everyone to retrieve items.
author: 游守正
content:
分類： 其他公告
來源： 教學卓越中心 - 游守正 - cecil@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6594
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生_休學學生
標題： 重要通知：K書中心6/19下午第四次開放大家拿取物品。6/19, K Book Center's A  buildings will be temporarily open for the 4th time on the afternoon of Jun 19 for everyone to retrieve items.
日期： Tue, 18 Jun 2024 19:47:33 +0800

所有在K書中心的物品，不論之前放置於A館或B館，都已統一移置於A館暫存，之前有找不到東西者，請於6/19(三)下午14：00~17：00，洽現場工讀生確認身份拿取；若仍不來領取，本中心不負保管責任，將於暑假期間逕行清除。

Dear faculty and students,
All items in the K Book Center, whether previously placed in Building A or Building B, have been temporarily relocated to Building A. For those who have been unable to find their belongings, please contact the on-site student worker to confirm your identity and retrieve your items on Wednesday, June 19, from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM. If items are not claimed by then, the center will not be responsible for their safekeeping and will dispose of them during the summer break.

Best regards,
Center of Teaching Excellence
